alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:33PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Umatilla County through 300 PM PDT... At 232 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Umatilla Reservation, or 8 miles east of Pendleton, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walla Walla, Pendleton, Athena, Adams, Helix, Umapine, Cayuse, Mission and northwestern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
